phase_1.name: Testing Foundation
key_achievements: Comprehensive test suite with unit, integration, and E2E tests

phase_2.name: Error Handling
key_achievements: All empty catch blocks replaced with specific error handling

completed_todos_archive: Create CTDDError class hierarchy with error codes
Replace empty catch blocks with specific error handling
Add timeout handling to plugin system
Add tests for error handling scenarios

blockers_encountered: TypeScript type issues caused most delays - plugins using 'any' type
Plugin schema validation more complex than expected
CLI tests don't count toward coverage measurement
Legacy code difficult to achieve high coverage on
successful_patterns: Error codes E001-E999 provide clear identification
Test-driven approach caught many edge cases
